Param.Name: vm_num
Param.paracomment-en: the num of vm need create

Param.Name: root_device
Param.paracomment-chs: 根设备名称（如hda,高级功能，默认不需要输入）
Param.paracomment-en: root devic name (eg:hda, advace function, default did't input)

Param.Name: kernel_command
Param.paracomment-chs: 内核命令（高级功能，默认不需要输入）
Param.paracomment-en: kernel command (advance function, default did't input)

Param.Name: boot_loader
Param.paracomment-chs: boot 加载器（高级功能，默认不需要输入）
Param.paracomment-en: boot loader (advance function, default did't input)

Param.Name: virt_type
Param.paracomment-chs: 虚拟化类型 hvm-全虚拟化，pvm-半虚拟化

Param.Name: rawdata
Param.paracomment-chs: 传给hypervisor的原始配置项(高级功能，默认不输入)
Param.paracomment-en: input hypervisor config(advance function, default did't input)

Param.Name: vnc_password
Param.paracomment-chs: 传给hypervisor的创建VNC服务的访问密码(高级功能，默认不输入)
Param.paracomment-en: input hypervisor config for VNC service(advance function, default did't input)

TreeNode.Name: indirect
TreeNode.treenode-comment-chs: 使用虚拟机模板创建虚拟机

Param.Name: project_name
Param.paracomment-en: project name which the vm belong to

Param.Name: vm_num
Param.paracomment-en: the num of vm to create

Command.cmd-postscript: 在此添加命令配置限制描述

Param.Name: []SQUARE
Param.prammarcomment-chs: 待迁移到的目标物理机id

Param.Name: host-id
Param.paracomment-chs: 待迁移到的目标物理机id

Param.Name: is-forced
Param.paracomment-chs: 是否强制热迁移至指定host

Command.formatstring-chs:
%hs2 %hc0: %v1%b %rs3: -----------------------------base info----------------------------- id = %v%w vm_name = %v%s state = %v%b owner = %v%s project_name = %v%s cluster_name = %v%s host_name = %v%s create_time = %v%s vcpu = %v%d tcu = %v%d memery = %v%.0f MB ----------------------- machine image ----------------------- machine_id = %v%w bus = %v%s target = %v%s -----------------------xen config para----------------------- root_device = %v%s kernel_command = %v%s bootloader = %v%s virt_type = %v%s rawdata = %v%s -------------------------context info------------------------ %rs: %v%s = %v%s %re ------------------vm sche policy(condition)------------------ %rs: --------------------------------------- key = %v%s opt = %v%s value = %v%s %re ------------------------- disk list ------------------------ %rs: ----------------disk------------------- id = %v%w size = %v%0.2f GB bus = %v%s type = %v%s target = %v%s %re
-------------------------vm nic list-------------------------- %rs: -----------------nic------------------- sriov = %v%b vlan = %v%d plane = %v%s dhcp = %v%b ip = %v%s netmask = %v%s gateway = %v%s mac = %v%s %re %re %hc1: %rs3: -----------------------------base info----------------------------- id = %v%w vm_name = %v%s state = %v%b owner = %v%s project_name = %v%s cluster_name = %v%s host_name = %v%s create_time = %v%s vcpu = %v%d tcu = %v%d memery = %v%.0f MB ----------------------- machine image ----------------------- machine_id = %v%w bus = %v%s target = %v%s -----------------------xen config para----------------------- root_device = %v%s kernel_command = %v%s bootloader = %v%s virt_type = %v%s rawdata = %v%s -------------------------context info------------------------ %rs: %v%s = %v%s %re ------------------vm sche policy(condition)------------------ %rs: --------------------------------------- key = %v%s opt = %v%s value = %v%s %re ------------------------- disk list ------------------------ %rs: ----------------disk------------------- id = %v%w size = %v%0.2f GB bus = %v%s type = %v%s target = %v%s %re
-------------------------vm nic list-------------------------- %rs: -----------------nic------------------- sriov = %v%b vlan = %v%d plane = %v%s dhcp = %v%b ip = %v%s netmask = %v%s gateway = %v%s mac = %v%s %re %re %hc2: %v1%b %he
Command.formatstring-en:
%hs2 %hc0: %v1%b %rs3: -----------------------------base info----------------------------- id = %v%w vm_name = %v%s state = %v%b owner = %v%s project_name = %v%s cluster_name = %v%s host_name = %v%s create_time = %v%s vcpu = %v%d tcu = %v%d memery = %v%.0f MB ----------------------- machine image ----------------------- machine_id = %v%w bus = %v%s target = %v%s -----------------------xen config para----------------------- root_device = %v%s kernel_command = %v%s bootloader = %v%s virt_type = %v%s rawdata = %v%s -------------------------context info------------------------ %rs: %v%s = %v%s %re ------------------vm sche policy(condition)------------------ %rs: --------------------------------------- key = %v%s opt = %v%s value = %v%s %re ------------------------- disk list ------------------------ %rs: ----------------disk------------------- id = %v%w size = %v%0.2f GB bus = %v%s type = %v%s target = %v%s %re
-------------------------vm nic list-------------------------- %rs: -----------------nic------------------- sriov = %v%b vlan = %v%d plane = %v%s dhcp = %v%b ip = %v%s netmask = %v%s gateway = %v%s mac = %v%s %re %re %hc1: %rs3: -----------------------------base info----------------------------- id = %v%w vm_name = %v%s state = %v%b owner = %v%s project_name = %v%s cluster_name = %v%s host_name = %v%s create_time = %v%s vcpu = %v%d tcu = %v%d memery = %v%.0f MB ----------------------- machine image ----------------------- machine_id = %v%w bus = %v%s target = %v%s -----------------------xen config para----------------------- root_device = %v%s kernel_command = %v%s bootloader = %v%s virt_type = %v%s rawdata = %v%s -------------------------context info------------------------ %rs: %v%s = %v%s %re ------------------vm sche policy(condition)------------------ %rs: --------------------------------------- key = %v%s opt = %v%s value = %v%s %re ------------------------- disk list ------------------------ %rs: ----------------disk------------------- id = %v%w size = %v%0.2f GB bus = %v%s type = %v%s target = %v%s %re
-------------------------vm nic list-------------------------- %rs: -----------------nic------------------- sriov = %v%b vlan = %v%d plane = %v%s dhcp = %v%b ip = %v%s netmask = %v%s gateway = %v%s mac = %v%s %re %re %hc2: %v1%b %he
